des: "Simple, yet easy rice recipe. My family doesn't like plain rice, so we had to come up with something different."
ins: Bring rice, water, milk, raisins, and margarine to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally.  Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until liquid has absorbed and rice is tender, about 15 minutes.  Mix together cinnamon and sugar, sprinkle over rice to serve.
